text: this Friday in Saudi Arabia a young man
named Roy Badawi is due to be publicly
flogged again the father of three
children has been sentenced to 1,000
lashes in total with 50 given each week
his family believed this is a recent
video of him
assembly o'reilly worried that he may
not survive the end of his punishment
it's important to emphasize why arrived
but away is being flogged as a blogger
he espoused secular and liberal ideas in
the ultra hardline kingdom he ran a
website called free Saudi liberals where
he mocked the Saudi religious
authorities for the hypocrisy for that
alone he was sentenced to 10 years and a
thousand lashes Saudi Arabia isn't just
another country astonishingly it's our
most important ally in the Middle East
it is the biggest buyer of British
weapons with 1.7 billion pounds worth of
arms export licenses currently in
existence an entire division of military
personnel and civil servants at the
Ministry of Defense are paid for by the
Saudi government
the lashing of wife Badawi exposes us to
an even bigger charge of hypocrisy Saudi
Arabia preaches the same extremist form
of Islam followed by terrorists from
Isis and al-qaeda it gave birth to the
virus spreading across the Middle East
and parts of Europe and British Muslims
have repeatedly warned of its pernicious
influence here yet we carry on hugging
them in 2007 Tony Blair stopped a
bribery investigation into Saudi arm
cells because they threatened
repercussions
now the Ministry of Justice wants to
sell them prison expertise the same
country that beheaded 87 people last
year the same country that jails women
drivers and people with liberal or
critical views are imprisoned or flogged
people like arrived Badawi
so why don't we treat it like a pariah
state because of money because they buy
our weapons and said the right things to
our leaders is that the kind of country
we want to be it's time we cut these
ties and treated the Kingdom of Saudi
Arabia with the contempt it deserves
